title: Price up causes TR up when demand is inelastic

content.question: Which of the following must be true if the revenues of wheat farmers increase when the price of wheat increase?

choices.label: The supply of wheat is price elastic.
The supply of wheat is income elastic.
The supply of wheat is income inelastic.
The demand for wheat is price elastic.
The demand for wheat is price inelastic.

content.answer: The demand for wheat is price inelastic.
